sn51.3:1.1: “Cattarome, bhikkhave, iddhipada bhavita bahulikata ariya niyyanika niyyanti takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn51.3:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
sn51.3:1.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata ariya niyyanika niyyanti takkarassa samma dukkhakkhayaya”ti.
